titleStmt.title: The law and light within the most sure rule or light, which sheweth the right use and end of the Scripture, manifested in opposition to several false principles inserted in a book intitled Scripture light the most sure light, by William Bridge, the great pastor and Reverend Father, so accounted, of the Church at Yarmouth in Norfolk / confuted by George Whitehead.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
